Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier signal problem near Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier signal problem near Roosevelt. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute near State/Superior
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses temp. rerouted SB: State, Chicago, Clark, Erie and State; NB: Dearborn, Walton, Clark and Division, near State/Superior.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near State/Superior.

Southbound buses will operate via State, Chicago, Clark, Erie and State.

Northbound buses will operate via Dearborn, Walton, Clark and Division.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute at Cicero/31st
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, 16th, Laramie, Cermak, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cicero, 16th, Laramie, Cermak, and Cicero due to street blockage near Cicero/31st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute at Cicero/21st
ShortDescription: 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, Laramie, 16th, Cicero, and Cermak due to street blockage near Cicero/21st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cermak, Laramie, 16th, Cicero, and Cermak, due to street blockage near Cicero/21st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Southbound Reroute near Austin/Madison
ShortDescription: Southbound 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Madison, Central, Jackson, and Austin due to street blockage near Austin/Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Madison, Central, Jackson, and Austin due to street blockage near Austin/Madison.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Westbound Reroute near Cermak/Wentworth
ShortDescription: Westbound 21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, State, Archer and Cermak: due to, street blockage near Cermak/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #21 Cermak buses are temporarily rerouted via Cermak, State, Archer and Cermak: due to, street blockage near Cermak/Wentworth.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
